hero-page.subtitle: Mu wani kamfanin kirkire-kirkire ne na Jamus wanda ke amfani da sabuwar fasaha don kirkirar wasannin bidiyo, manhajoji, da kuma abubuwan da suka shafi kafofin watsa labarai masu kayatarwa da saukin amfani ga kowa.

download-page.title: Sauke
download-page.subtitle: Anan zaka iya saukewa da duba ayyukanmu

tiers.description10: Samar da bidiyo mai ingancin situdiyo
tiers.description11: Zurfin bincike a cikin lambarmu da zane
tiers.description12: Sadarwa kai tsaye da masu haɓaka mu
tiers.description13: Akwai a duk duniya a YouTube
tiers.description20: Akwai a kan IOS da Android
tiers.description21: Wasa kyauta ba tare da wani boyayyen kuɗi ba
tiers.description22: Yana goyan bayan tsofaffin na'urorin hannu
tiers.description23: Wasa mai sauƙi ga kowane lokaci da rana
tiers.description24: An gabatar a cikin bayanan ci gaba
tiers.description30: Akwai don Windows, Macos da Linux
tiers.description31: Rarrabawa ta hanyar Steam da Apple Store

faq.title: Tambayoyin da aka saba yi
faq.subtitle1: Ta yaya zan tuntubi tallafin abokin ciniki idan ina da tambaya ko matsala?
faq.description1: Kuna iya tuntuɓar ƙungiyar tallafin abokin cinikinmu ta hanyar imel a:
faq.subtitle2: Me ya sa samfurinku ya bambanta da sauran a kasuwa?
faq.description2: Samfurinmu ya bambanta ta hanyar daidaitawa, dorewa, da sabbin abubuwa. Muna ba da fifiko ga gamsuwa mai amfani kuma muna ci gaba da ƙoƙarin wuce tsammanin a kowane fanni.
faq.subtitle3: Ta yaya zan iya tallafawa GiftBytesProductions?
faq.description3: Kun riga kun taimaka mana ta hanyar gwada ayyukanmu da ba da shawarar su. In ba haka ba, kuna iya biyan kuɗin tasharmu ta YouTube kuma ku shiga cikin al'umma. Don ƙarin tallafi, kuna iya ba mu gudummawa kai tsaye ta hanyar PayPal.

feature-page.title: Fasaloli
feature-page.subheader: Binciko fasaloli masu ƙarfi waɗanda ke sa aikace-aikacenmu ya fice.

items.title: Zane-zanen Farko na Waya
items.description: An tsara manhajarmu da tsarin farko na wayar hannu, wanda ke tabbatar da ingantacciyar kwarewa a kowace na'ura.

items.title: Dashboard Mai Sauƙin Fahimta
items.description: Dashboard mai tsabta da tsari wanda ke ba ku cikakken bayani a kallo ɗaya.

items.title: Daidaituwa Tsakanin Na'urori
items.description: Ji daɗin ingantacciyar kwarewa mai ƙarfi ko kuna kan kwamfutar tebur, kwamfutar hannu, ko wayar salula.

article.title: Sanarwar sabon aiki
article.description: Muna sanar da cewa sabon aikinmu zai zama wasan bidiyo na kwamfutar tebur kyauta wanda zai kasance a kan dukkan tsarin aiki da dandamali.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai Haɓakawa

article.title: Sabon yanar gizo
article.description: Muna sanar da cewa a ƙarshe gidan yanar gizonmu yana kan layi kuma a bayyane yake.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai Haɓakawa

article.title: TouchSlider yana kan layi
article.description: Muna sanar da cewa wasan bidiyo na wayar hannu TouchSlider yana samuwa don saukewa kyauta a kan IOS da Android.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai Haɓakawa

principles-page.title: Ka'idojinmu
principles-page.subheader: Waɗannan dabi'u suna cikin zuciyar duk abin da muke ginawa, daga layin farko na lamba zuwa kwarewar mai amfani ta ƙarshe.

items.title: Akwai a Ko'ina
items.description: Mun yi imanin cewa babban software ya kamata ya yi aiki ga kowa, a kowace na'ura. An tsara ayyukanmu da kyau don daidaituwa tsakanin dandamali da samun dama daga farko.

items.title: Goge da Inganci
items.description: Muna ba da cikakkun abubuwan da aka inganta sosai. Mayar da hankalinmu kan tsaftataccen gine-gine da gwaji mai tsauri yana tabbatar da cewa kowane samfurin yana da kwanciyar hankali, inganci, kuma a shirye yake don jin daɗi daga rana ta farko.

items.title: Zane Mai Sauƙin Fahimta
items.description: Mun yi imanin cewa software mai ƙarfi ba dole ba ne ya zama mai rikitarwa. Sha'awarmu tana cikin ƙirƙirar tsaftatattun hanyoyin sadarwa masu sauƙin fahimta waɗanda ke sa kowane hulɗa ya zama mai sauƙi da daɗi.

items.title: Ƙarfafawa ta hanyar Ƙirƙira
items.description: Muna ginawa tare da tunanin gaba. Ta hanyar amfani da sabuwar fasahar software da kayan aiki, muna ƙirƙirar samfuran da ke tunanin gaba tare da ayyuka masu ƙarfi, na zamani.

items.title: Taimako na Musamman
items.description: Dangantakarmu ba ta ƙarewa a saukewa. Muna ba da tallafi mai daɗi, mai saurin amsawa kai tsaye daga ƙungiyarmu don tabbatar da cewa koyaushe kuna da kyakkyawar kwarewa da samfuranmu.

items.title: Sana'a Mai Kyau
items.description: Mun yi imanin cewa nagarta tana cikin cikakkun bayanai. Daga ra'ayi na farko zuwa layin ƙarshe na lamba, kowane ɓangare na aikinmu an tsara shi da kyau kuma an aiwatar da shi daidai don samfurin ƙarshe mara aibu.

testimonials-page.title: Shaida
testimonials-page.subheader: Duba abin da abokan cinikinmu, masu haɓakawa, da masu gwadawa ke so game da samfuranmu.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ina matukar son yadda wannan samfurin yake da yawa! Ko ina aiki a kan ayyukan aiki ko ina cikin abubuwan da na fi so, yana dacewa da bukatuna masu canzawa. Zane-zanensa mai sauƙin fahimta ya inganta rayuwata ta yau da kullun, yana sa ayyuka su zama masu inganci da daɗi.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ɗaya daga cikin fitattun fasalulluka na wannan samfurin shine goyon bayan abokin ciniki na musamman. A cikin kwarewata, ƙungiyar da ke bayan wannan samfurin ta kasance mai saurin amsawa kuma tana da taimako sosai. Yana da tabbaci sanin cewa suna tsaye a bayan samfuransu.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Matsayin sauƙi da sauƙin amfani a cikin wannan samfurin ya sauƙaƙa rayuwata sosai. Ina godiya ga masu kirkirar don samar da mafita wanda ba wai kawai ya cika ba, har ma ya wuce tsammanin mai amfani.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ina godiya da kulawa da dalla-dalla a cikin zane na wannan samfurin. Ƙananan abubuwa suna yin babban bambanci, kuma a bayyane yake cewa masu kirkirar sun mai da hankali kan samar da kwarewa mai inganci.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Na gwada wasu samfuran makamantan su, amma wannan ya fice saboda sabbin fasalulluka. A bayyane yake cewa masu yin sun yi tunani sosai wajen ƙirƙirar mafita wanda da gaske yake magance bukatun mai amfani.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ingancin wannan samfurin ya wuce tsammanina. Yana da dorewa, an tsara shi da kyau, kuma an gina shi don ya daɗe. Tabbas ya cancanci saka hannun jari.
